title: F0 Audio Analyser
description:
A full-stack web application
•  Backend: Python API with Flask
•  Frontend: JavaScript

Calculating the fundamental frequency of an audio file
Building a plot and spectrograms for the data
Playing the uploaded file and calculated values

title: Song XML Editor
description:
PyQT desktop application
•  create and save song XML documents
•  add structural and melodic elements
•  preview, edit, and delete XML elements in QTreeView
•  check sheet music with XML to LilyPond converter

A PyQt desktop app for creating and editing
XML documents of a predefined structure.
